transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, main Tanay Prakash baat kar raha hun sir, IndiaMART se, Business Manager.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Senior manager baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Achcha aap hi ne mere se baat ki thi na do din pehle aapne bola tha HOD se solution dilaunga.
Executive: Haan sir jo aapki category ke regarding maine discussion kiya tha. Aapka jo particular main aapko maine mail bhi kiya tha isi ke regarding.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Thodi netting chali.
Customer: Thodi si, haan thodi si dijiye.
Executive: Kya?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji sir hamara wohi baat hua tha ki aapka jo foil fabric hai aur fabric hai usi ke particular lead usi ki quality ki lead humein chahiye. Aur usi se hamara improvement hona chahiye matlab ki all over India ke liye tha aapka.
Customer: Samjha nahi aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai sir. Executive: Sir foil fabric aapka jo hai kaam particular BSY jo hota hai aapne bataya tha BSY karke ek material hota hai usi mein aapko basically usi se related saari lead chahiye aur nahi toh aapka jo print script hota hai usse related lead nahi chahiye aapko bas. Yahi do aapka product tha yahi do material se aap apna kaam karte hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Right? Haan.
Customer: Haan haan. Executive: Aapne mujhe bataya tha uska by shrinkage yarn karke aise kuch naam bataya tha aapne mujhe. Maine likha tha by shrinkage yarn.
Customer: BSY.
Executive: BSY kar bol rahe the.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh sir uski lead nahi aa rahi hai na?
Executive: Uski lead nahi aa rahi. Bilkul sir usi cheez se humne baat ki uski lead ke liye hum madam se baat karenge. Theek hai? But sir uski lead ko agar main.
Executive: Sir maine category ki main apna mail check kar le raha hun sir kyunki maine aapko na ek issue raise kiya tha. Uske kya result hai main ek baar check kar leta hun.
Executive: Haan sir. Sir dekhiye maine yahan pe jo check kiya tha na case ke andar jo maine raise kiya tha toh foil fabric karke aur sab uska na bulk leads wagera sab kuch aapke paas available aa raha hai sir. But usko hum woh utilize nahi kar paaye toh maine aapko ek activity batai thi I am interested mark karne ke liye past leads mein ja kar ke. Woh check kiya tha sir aapne?
Customer: Kya karna tha?
Executive: Sir past leads mein jayenge na past leads. Abhi aap laptop pe hain mobile pe hain kya pe hain sir aap?
Customer: Aawaz nahi aa rahi sir kya bol rahe hain. Executive: Toh main puch raha hun ki aap mobile se use kar rahe hain ya laptop pe hain sir? Mobile, mobile se sir.
Executive: Mobile mein sir leads pe click kariye ek baar by leads se. Achcha by leads pe ek minute.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Chalu rakhiye sir. Haan haan bilkul sir.
Executive: Foil leads related foil leads aa raha hai us pe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir ab usme aapko na right side mein teen dot dikh raha hoga sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Teen dot pe wahan pe kya kya option aa raha hai sir aapko batayenge ek baar? Search, suggested.
Customer: Past, restore, delete, related leads aa raha hai. Executive: Past, past pe click kariye sir. Past pe haan. Ji. Ab sir past mein jo aapko dikha raha hai woh dikha raha hoga plain foil fabric Mumbai Maharashtra ka 9 ghanta pehle dikha raha hoga sir aapka ek. Haan haan haan. Uske niche aapko ek cotton Vatican discharge foil print fabric print print ye sab dikha raha hoga sir. Toh sir ye mujhe bataye ye jo lead aaya hai aapke paas ye saari woh aapke matlab ka kaam ka woh wala lead hai ya nahi hai sir ye? Nahi dada.
Customer: Ye nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: Achcha. Isme ek bhi matlab ka nahi hai. Ye jo aapko dikh raha hai isme ek bhi koi matlab ka nahi hai aapka. Sahi sir ek bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Isse toh aapko tang kar raha hun sir. Executive: Nahi sir sahi hai aap tang karne mein koi dikkat nahi hai is cheez ke liye. Wohi toh. Mujhe isme kya dikkat aa raha hai isme isme sir jaise material polyester likh diya hai isme. Nahi sir dikkat aa raha hai ki mere jo BSY hai na uska lead nahi hai is app pe ye nahi hai. Ye dikkat hai sir. Main samajh gaya sir by shrinkage yarn wala jo BSY aap bol rahe hain toh usko identify karne ka kya tarika hai material mein polyester ke jagah BSY nikalna hai aapko. BSY likh toh denge apan par lead nahi aayegi na. Main wohi puch raha hun are sir lead main isliye man lijiye lead kaise aayega main aapka jo keyword hai woh google pe add karwaunga uska hai na ki koi search kare toh aapka IndiaMART pe aa jaye. Toh main wohi puch raha hun BSY ka kya matlab rahega matlab ki material mein dalega uska woh banwaun kya banwaun alag se main aapke liye. Material mein jayega woh cheez ya ki naam pe jayega woh cheez BSY. BSY related woh BSY hi search karta hai. Haan. Just BSY ke naam se hi material bikta hai. Naam naam naam se jayega hai na? Ye cheez. Aur BSY jo hota hai uska koi material define hota hai sir? Kyunki sir mujhe nahi pata isliye main ye sab chhote chhote bacchon wale sawal puch raha hun but kyunki woh zaruri hai sir mere samajhne ke liye. Material define nahi hota. Material kuch define nahi hota BSY hi woh naam bhi hai woh ek tarah ka material bhi hai sir ye maan lo. Haan. Haan. Hmm. Sir main baat toh lead nahi hai is pe. Toh koi matlab bhi nahi hai mera try karne ka is pe. Composite yarn created by combining two different yarns with different shrinkage rates. This process gives the fabric a unique texture with minimum brush effect during processing. Creating a smooth and durable fabric. Buying matlab do material mein se hum composite yarn created by combining theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Kya kare sir fir iska is cheez ka aap bataye matlab isme. Sir solution toh yahi hai ki koi kaam ka nahi hai ye plan. Hmm. Ho sake toh retreat kara dijiye. Aur ho bhi jayega aapke salesman ne kaha tha. Theek hai sir main ek baar baat kar leta hun aapko is cheez ke liye. Haan sir. Kyun main bhi try kar hi raha hun do se teen teen mahine toh ho hi gaye isko. Hello. Haan ji haan ji haan ji sir. Haan sir teen mahine se main bhi try kar hi raha hun. Aapke ji ne bhi lead nikal ke di mere ko par usme se bhi ek bhi koi woh kya kehte hain relevant nahi thi. Unko reason bhi bataya maine kyun. Isliye. Main samajh gaya sir. Bilkul haan sahi baat hai. Main ek baar apne ko aage badha kar ke aapko confirm kar deta hun. Haan sir. Haan sir aap socho main 5 crore ka kapda bechta hun ya bech ke par mera 500 ka bhi nahi bika hai aapke app pe. Hmm. Aisa isliye. Hmm. Theek hai sir. Ye baat hai sir. Main samajh gaya sir main ek baar isse baat kar ke aage badha deta hun. Theek hai? Haan. Dhanyavad. Dhanyavad sir. Kya kya tha iska process tha toh wohi wohi develop kiye the.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants leads for foil fabric and BSY material.

- Not getting relevant leads on IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with the current subscription plan.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the past leads for foil fabric.

- Explained how to mark interested in past leads.

- Executive agreed to discuss the issue internally.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm after discussing internally.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, foil fabric, bsy material
